resources.string:
"Unable to activate free data service. This might be caused by an overdue phone bill or a package that hasn't taken effect. Contact the local carrier to check your account status.
The service request will be sent to your carrier every day, please check it regularly."

"Unable to activate free data service. This might be caused by an overdue phone bill or a package that hasn't taken effect. Contact the local carrier to check your account status.
The service request will be sent to your carrier every day, please check it regularly."
